website_summaries.verdict: The best budget option for anyone seeking a simple travel pillow in a pinch. Will get the job done without any extra frills.
pros: Internal polyester stuffing of the pillow is soft and comfortable for long sleeping periods
Will fit into small areas when not in use
cons: On the larger side for a travel pillow, which may be awkward to use in the average airline seat

customer_reviews.title: MEETS MY NEEDS
customer_reviews.text: bought this pillow not for travelling but to use while sleeping. I am a side sleeper and a lot of the time my shoulder hurts therefore i wanted a small pillow to lay next to me near my chest to prop my arm on, and this does the trick. Thickness is just right
customer_reviews.author: Susan P

customer_reviews.title: The stuffing gets wadded when washed.  They came from Walmart.
customer_reviews.text: If I had known they were from Walmart I would not have purchased them. I wash or dry-clean ALL material that comes in contact with my skin before I use it because I'm allergic. These pillows literally "came apart" inside. To my mind, they are worthless. I would never have bought them if the description had said they were from Walmart. I believe it was a deception on Amazon's part to sell substandard products from places like Walmart and not let the customers know what they are purchasing beforehand!
customer_reviews.author: Female Techie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it at Wal-Mart if you want it...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is obviously from Wal-Mart... or at least it is the Mainstays brand you find there. I wish I didn't have such pregnancy brain and realized it before I purchased it. The quality would be equivalent to the $3.00 pillows found at Wal-Mart. Needless to say I was a bit bummed about this purchase.... what a waste of $.
customer_reviews.author: MommyofTWO1116

customer_reviews.title: I feel it is an excellent value. The pillows always arrive quickly and are ...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this produced several times as pillows wear out over time (I replace them every two years or so with daily use). I feel it is an excellent value. The pillows always arrive quickly and are as described. I would recommend this product and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Good travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this pillow in the past. It is a nice size and I use it for various things (while traveling in vehicles, under and between bad knees, etc.). It eventually breaks down and I use it for my cat boxes.
customer_reviews.author: sylfish

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Pillow for Those Who Love the Rectangle Kind
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly comfortable, traditional travel pillow. It is easy to pack or attach to luggage with a bungee cord. It does not lose its shape easily, and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: CygneNoir

customer_reviews.title: A little larger and more comfortable than my previous pillow
customer_reviews.text: A little larger and more comfortable than my previous pillow. Just make sure you really have room for it in your suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea C.

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pillows. They appear to be 2 different pillows. The cover on one is silky and smooth. The cover on the other is just regular material. These don't offer much support. I prefer a smaller firmer pillow.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Loving the pillows
customer_reviews.text: I have order so many of these pillows. My granddaughters love them. Will I order again? You bet I would. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Martha P.

customer_reviews.title: Great little pillow.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is exactly what I was hoping for. It is a perfect size to tuck in where more pillow is needed, or to tuck between my knees to help sore hips in bed. It has kept its' shape through daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J

customer_reviews.title: It has held up nicely to daily use and a weekly clothes wash/drying
customer_reviews.text: We've used this as a day care pillow for our son. It has held up nicely to daily use and a weekly clothes wash/drying.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 of these. They are good quality but very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Right size pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love my pillow. It is my cuddle up pillow for my arms while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Bradley

customer_reviews.title: but it is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: As this is a small travel pillow I didn’t expect much, but it is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit thin and marginally supportive. I would keep looking, if I were you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pillows were a little smaller than I thought and softer than I really wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Don't know why you can't find them in the store anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love the size & the softness of the pillow. It fits in my carry on luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: 3 months of occasional use and the seam totally opened up and all the fill is coming out
customer_reviews.author: Tammi L. Weiandt

customer_reviews.title: It is just what I was looking for. I ...
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I was looking for. I was not able to find one in any local store. It has multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a nice little travel pillow that wouldn't take up a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute little pillow. I was looking for a nice little travel pillow that wouldn't take up a lot of room in the suitcase. This pillow looks like it it very comfortable - I haven't used it, because I bought it for my son. But it does look very nice, and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: maggiejane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to find a travel pillow in the winter. I use it for my toddler. Love the ease of finding hard to find things anytime!
customer_reviews.author: Mylissa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Usually I'm mostly pleased to very pleased with the products I order, not so in this case. The pillow is a marshmallow. There's absolutely no substance to it. It gives no support. I resume my search.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Rae Fender

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for travel, children, lumbar support...just a great "do-all" little pillow. When they need to be freshened, just toss in washer and dryer. They come out great. I have purchased several of these over the years and have never been disappointed with the quality. When the pillows get past their "prime", I recycle into cushions for our cat beds. They love them too!
customer_reviews.author: Laural A McPhillips

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support for neck
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small pillow for nape of neck. This one didn't have enough support for me, for my neck.
customer_reviews.author: smc5013

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic buy! Got tired of going to store to empty bin.
customer_reviews.author: msv419

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: No issues with this pillow. Well made and will last forever. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Chulada

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size pillow and it's nice and filled. This is the size that most pillowcases will fit so that was another reason for buying. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hot mess

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great little pillow; very soft and malleable so not for anyone who wants firm support; exactly what I wanted so I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: My Neck thanks you;
customer_reviews.text: Great travel pillow! We happen to be away now. So glad I brought this. The pillows in this resort are SO hard, my neck and shoulders were killing me, just using the resort pillow for 5 minutes;
customer_reviews.author: Orene Morin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is the correct size I wanted, but is too full for real comfort.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Nice semi-firm little pillow for traveling or back/neck support while sitting in recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Teriffic little pillows for travel or anywhere...easy for the kids to carry around ...Nice quality...great price
customer_reviews.author: june mcclish

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable pillow. I use it in my recliner when I am reading. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Not keeping shape very well...
customer_reviews.text: Using this for about a month and the shape is already changing. Hoping to get a few more months out of it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lundin

customer_reviews.title: Great little pillow
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfy, great for traveling to have your own pillow
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: The like the
customer_reviews.text: I'm with the Elk Grove Elks and we donate the item to the Mather Veterans hospital for Veterans. The like the items
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT C. SAMANIEGO

customer_reviews.title: Great companion for camping or B
customer_reviews.text: Comfy little beast, would buy again. Great companion for camping or B.O.B bags
customer_reviews.author: Commander Beard

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: really too large and bulky for a perfect travel pillow
customer_reviews.author: george giatras

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy and Soft travel Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my me! I am small 5.2 and 115 lbs and have boney knees...haha..I love to sleep with this pillow between my knees every night. I also take this with me when we travel for car and airplane. I was so happy to find a pillow case that keeps the dust mites out as well from AllerEase that is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: angel43057

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I'm fostering a little easily frightened dog. She loves to burrow under pillows and blankets. This pillow is just the right size for her bed. (Yes, I'm spoiling her, but she has had a rough life) she sleeps on it sometimes and with it on her face sometimes. We approve.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: I had this childhood friend ,,
customer_reviews.text: I had this friend when I was a kid who always would sleep with a teddy bear. I just learned that this friend's teddy bear has been replaced by this pillow. It is super soft and cuddly..... he tells me.
customer_reviews.author: keaise

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Super soft but enough support and just the right size for someone who likes to twist and adjust their pillow.
customer_reviews.author: She Reads

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have another pillow like this and wanted a second one. This is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: ... help hold my broke leg up and it worked great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to help hold my broke leg up and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... PUGS STEAL MY PILLOWS AT NITE SO THIS IS PERFECT AND ALL MINE❗️
customer_reviews.text: RECEIVED MY PILLOW YESTERDAY AND LUV IT❗️I WILL BUY ONE FOR MY RV NEXT❗️ MY PUGS STEAL MY PILLOWS AT NITE SO THIS IS PERFECT AND ALL MINE❗️

product_meta.title: Mainstay 94468-3018 Travel Pillow
product_meta.description:
Package Quantity:1Mainstays 100 Percent Polyester Travel Pillow 14" x 20" in White:
Ideal for travel on airplanes, cars or trains
Hypoallergenic polyester fiber fill for support
Durable and comfortable to travel with and provide you with support
Machine washable for easy care and maintenance
Easy to fold up in your bag to travel with
When you are looking for the perfect size pillow to travel with, this is the pillow you need. Mainstays 100% Polyester Travel Pillow is available in 14"x20". This travel pillow is 100% polyester cover and is filled with 100% polyester fiberfill. This pillow is perfect size to fit in your suitcase. Wherever you travel, take along the soft microfiber polyester Mainstays Travel Pillow for on-the-go snoozing or just to have that little bit of support for your head and neck to rest on during those flights or car rides. This pillow is machine washable aand dryable for easy care. Comes with a 3 year warranty.
